item.title: 美国酝酿首次绿色债券销售，开拓 26 亿美元市场

item.title: 比尔-黄受审：针对 Archegos 创始人的刑事案件解析
item.description: 黄成国（Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang）通过他的 "家族办公室 "Archegos Capital Management 管理自己的财富，在华尔街保持低调。但 2021 年 3 月，Archegos 突然倒闭，成为头条新闻，几乎抹去了 Hwang 360 亿美元的财富。这次倒闭也让公司的贷款人损失了 100 亿美元，导致瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse Group AG）倒闭。【原文：Sung Kook “Bill” Hwang maintained a low profile on Wall Street as he managed his own wealth through his “family office,” known as Archegos Capital Management. But then Archegos suddenly melted down in March 2021, making headlines and all but erasing Hwang’s $36 billion fortune. The collapse also cost the firm’s lenders $10 billion, contributing to the downfall of Credit Suisse Group AG.】

item.title: 迪拜亿万富翁的子女计划重振陷入困境的世界群岛

item.title: Peel Hunt 称，出售 NatWest 的现金应转入英国主权基金

item.title: KKR 盈利调整后第一季度利润超预期

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在市场等待美联储今天晚些时候的利率决定和评论之际，股票期货走低。同时，随着财报季的继续，万事达卡（Mastercard）和辉瑞制药（Pfizer）等公司的财报仍是市场关注的焦点。【原文：Good morning. Stock futures are pointing lower as markets await the Fed’s rate decision and commentary later today. Meanwhile stocks remain in focus as earnings season continues, with Mastercard and Pfizer among companies reporting.】

item.title: CVS 以医疗成本上升为由下调年度利润预期
